    • Method Detail

      • makeGaussKernel1D

        public static float[] makeGaussKernel1D​(double sigma)
        Creates and returns a 1D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects. The resulting array is odd-sized. The returned kernel is normalized.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the width (standard deviation) of the Gaussian
        Returns:
        the Gaussian filter kernel
